name: WizdomSubs Downloader
overview: Hebrew subtitle downloads from WizdomSubs for Jellyfin (movies & episodes).
description: Provides a Jellyfin subtitle provider that searches WizdomSubs by IMDb id, downloads Hebrew SRT files, and attaches them beside media files.

versions.changelog: Jellyfin 10.11.2 compatibility: Updated to .NET 9.0, fixed ILibraryManager API changes, improved HttpClient management with IHttpClientFactory, automatic series IMDb resolution for TV episodes.
Initial preview release: core subtitle provider, config page, manual search & download.
